error_description: Redundant @Autowired annotation on constructor which is unnecessary for constructor injection
Double password encoding in updateUserEntityFromUserRequest mapper expression causing incorrect password hashing
UserServiceImpl constructor calls @Autowired on constructor parameters which is redundant and confusing since Spring automatically injects constructor parameters
Redundant @Autowired annotation on constructor which is unnecessary since Spring Boot 2.6+ automatically injects constructor dependencies without explicit @Autowired
Redundant @Autowired annotation on constructor which is unnecessary since Spring Boot automatically injects constructor dependencies
DELETE endpoint lacks @PreAuthorize security annotation allowing unauthorized user deletion
